citeinfo.origin: Russian Academy of Science, Institute of Marine Geology and Geophysics
citeinfo.title: Empirical Model of Tidal Regime of the North-Eastern Shelf of Sakhalin Island

descript.abstract: A correct prediction of tidal currents and sea is highly important for the northeastern shelf of Sakhalin Island because of development of the oil and natural gas industries in this area. The main problem of the tidal regime is determination of tidal harmonic constants (amplitudes and phases) from the available sea level and current observational series.
descript.purpose: A report on the empirical Model of Tidal Regime of the North-Eastern shelf of Sakhalin Island
